name: Mine Mania
description:
Fight to survive as long as you can while collecting ore and avoiding alien monstrosities! 

You are a miner working for Smash & Grab Industries, it is your responsibility to mine ore on a distant alien planet: Zorp. The planet is inhabited by deadly alien monstrosities that will attempt to eat you. Collect ore to drop off at repair points throughout the game in order to gain points and repair your mining tank. 

Made for an academic group game jam project - 5 weeks production 

Controls 

  • Space - Shoot
  • Left arrow - Move Left
  • Right arrow - Move Right
  • Esc - Pause

Credits

  • Design -  Claire Langton - Goh (Devillia59) & Hattie Train
  • Art - Reece Burnett & Jason Cumming

Feedback welcome, enjoy the game!
